about_the_game:
Set out on an epic journey to Iowa in American Truck Simulator! Get behind the wheel and traverse the I-80 to the state capital, Des Moines, as well as other cities along the Mississippi River. Along the way, you'll pass through picturesque rural towns, and quaint hills intertwined with winding rivers that add to the charm of the Hawkeye State.

Iowa, also known as the Corn State, is the heart of America's agricultural industry, being the largest producer of corn. As a trucker, you'll play a crucial role in transporting this vital produce across the nation. While on the road, you'll also encounter the iconic wind farms that define Iowa's skyline.

The Hawkeye State is a blend of natural beauty, rich agricultural heritage, and vibrant cities steeped in culture and history. The state is also dotted with plenty of roadside attractions. If you take the time to explore, you'll find Iowa is home to many unique landmarks, which we encourage you to discover and even take a photo or two.

Make sure to add the DLC to your Steam Wishlist to show your excitement about this upcoming project that will further expand the world of American Truck Simulator!

Also, please remember that everything shown or written here is a Work in Progress until the DLC is complete and released.
